cause.description:
We're planning to raise millions of dollars to help the ever-growing crisis in the western Sudan region of Darfur. The Sudanese government has allowed for militia, Janjaweed, to attack innocent Darfur inhabitants. We plan to help the Darfur inhabitants protect themselves and end this crisis.
1. Save Lives
2. Save Darfur
3. Save the World
cause.mission: Help the inhabitants of Darfur protect themselves from Janjaweed attacks.
cause.name: Darfur Lives
